ThingDef.label: archotech eye
ThingDef.description: An artifical eye built by an archotech. It perceives every type of electromagnetic radiation, including radio waves, infrared, light, x-rays, and gamma rays. Its visual acuity is precise enough to read handwriting from twenty meters away. It can emit various wavelengths of radiation like a flashlight, and has an internal subpersona AI which helps highlight useful visual information. Externally, it looks like a natural human eye, except it can change color at will. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech arm
ThingDef.description: An artifical arm built by an archotech. It's strong enough to crush a thick hardwood branch in its hand, and precise enough to write a sonnet on a grain of rice. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech leg
ThingDef.description: An artifical leg built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but a pair of these can move the user as fast as a decent car, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech heart
ThingDef.description: An artifical heart built by an archotech. It more efficient than natural heart and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech stomach
ThingDef.description: An artifical stomach built by an archotech. It more efficient than natural stomach and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.description: An artifical jaw built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural jaw, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.description: An artifical spine built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.description: An artifical clavicle built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.description: An artifical sternum built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.description: An artifical rib built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.description: An artifical pelvis built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.description: An artifical radius built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.description: An artifical femur built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: archotech tibia
ThingDef.description: An artifical tibia built by an archotech. It's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced antitoxin kidney
ThingDef.description: An advanced antitoxin kidney built by an archotech. It more efficient than natural kidney, has advanced toxin filtering system, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced medical liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced medical liver built by an archotech. It more efficient than natural liver, can secreted more kind of immune system, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced energized liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced energized liver built by an archotech. It more efficient than natural liver, can secreted special hormone that make user more energetic, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced power blade
ThingDef.description: An advanced power blade built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural shoulder, has scyther blade attached to it, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced power arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced power arm built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural arm, have high blunt damage, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced power claw
ThingDef.description: An advanced power claw built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural hand, has sharp claw attached to it, and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced breathing support rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced breathing support rib built by an archotech. It can make user breath more ease and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced relaxation rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced relaxation rib built by an archotech. It can make user feel more relaxed and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced cold regulator rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced cold regulator rib built by an archotech. It can support blood to regulate cold temperature and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.

ThingDef.label: advanced heat regulator rib
ThingDef.description: An advanced heat regulator rib built by an archotech. It can support blood to regulate hot temperature and it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Requires archotech surgery research to install it.
